executiveSummary: Lisa and Jake from New Jersey pitched their product, Rinseroo, on Shark Tank, seeking $343,000 for 5% equity. The product, a slip-on hose for easier rinsing and cleaning, impressed the Sharks with strong sales, profitability, and branding. Lori Greiner ultimately offered them her Golden Ticket, granting exactly what they asked for and becoming their investor.
keyDecisions: Lori Greiner invested $343,000 for 5% equity using her Golden Ticket offer.

actionItems.task: Collaborate with Lori Greiner to expand Rinseroo’s market presence and distribution
Leverage Lori’s retail and marketing expertise to scale sales beyond online channels

nextSteps: Lisa and Jake will begin partnership work with Lori Greiner to grow Rinseroo’s brand and retail distribution following the Shark Tank investment.
